title: Gameplay- Sound animation on snowday singed still not resolved
body: Played singed for the first time in a few months used my snow day skin and it still has the double sound on the recall.

replies.body:
Hey Beardedleo - 

Thanks for the report! Looks like this issue was originally resolved in April, but it's possible the issue has resurfaced. We can take another look and see what's going on!
Thank you. I did some research and saw the it was fixed but im still having the issue. What could I do if it continues and its not an issue on your end?

Looks like everything is good on my end - I'm only hearing the recall once.

If you're still having this issue, I may suggest trying a client repair. It's possible that a file may have patched out weird and isn't in the right spot.
